ygData.subject: The Neo USSR Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: (I urge everyone to read to the VERY end, I don t care if you don t want to, you HAVE TO!  It concerns EVERYONE, even if you don t see it developing, believe

Subject: The Neo USSR Beast Wars RPG
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

(I urge everyone to read to the VERY end, I don't care if you don't want to, 
you HAVE TO!  It concerns EVERYONE, even if you don't see it developing, 
believe me...it could change the fate of the Neo Beast Wars...so read to the 
end, especially Zardus!)


Koga Shuko/Serpentor/Nemesis Enforcer/Anubis/Hades/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Ramhorn/Pyro/Breakdown/Scavenger:



Koga Shuko raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at the Ark.  He 
had now seen many Predacons retreat.  <All forces under me, Koga Shuko, fall 
back.  Our 'allies' seem to be lacking in courage, even when the battle is 
ours> he ordered his troops, walking away, followed by Unitron.  

---

Sixshot got a lock, firing off a missile at the portside of the Ark, heading 
for the Newcomer base now.

---

Hades was going to run off, but he heard something.  Looking down, he saw a 
grenade.  He turned and ran, but the grenade exploded, sending flames and 
shrapnel into his back, sending him flying forward to the ground.

---

Anubis raised his launcher, firing a rocket off at Prowl, getting Hades up, 
putting over his shoulder, and heading off.

---

Pyro saw the grenade coming towards them, firing at it in mid-air, watching 
it explode, he didn't flinch, his optics on the flames.

Neither did the others, but the other two winced as shrapnel scraped against 
them.

Breakdown looked around slowly, raising his missile launcher, firing a 
grenade off, the grenade exploding against Ramhorn's chest, sending the 
Maximal slamming into thw all, going unconsciouss.
"Shut up!  I love good ranting, but you're just an idiot!" the 
second-in-command of the Oblitercons said, sighing.  Let's move out!  Not one 
of these Maximals has the br-what the?" he yelled, a missile from nowhere 
slamming him back 8 feet, crashing to the ground.

Pyro fired a burst of flames forward, seeing Injector and Manterror surging 
forward, the two stopping and stepping back.  He heard a clang as Manterror 
stepped back.  Like he had backed into something.  "Scavenger, open fire on 
that green guy!" he ordered, refering to Manterror, who wa a green praying 
mantis.

Scavenger raised his chaingun, firing 25 explosive shells.  Twenty-two of the 
shells exploded against Manterror's chest and abdomen, sending him slamming 
backwards.  Though the slamming sound of metal against metal, which would've 
been caused by Manterror slamming into the wall, happened strangely.  The 
sound happened, but Manterror was leaning BACK as much as he could in pain, 
but he wasn't touching the wall, he was still 3 ft from the wall.  "Someone's 
cloaked!" Scavenger yelled, a stinger missile catching him in the side, 
sending him slamming backwards.

Pyro raised his flame cannon, firing a fireball, engulfing Manterror who 
yelled for a moment, falling to the ground, an orange missile sending Pyro 
flying backwards, slamming back-first on the ground.

---

Serpentor took out his energy blade, Nemesis Enforcer taking out his own 
blade.
Slashing forward, their blades met, creating a crackling sound.  
"I will win this feud between us!" Serpentor yelled, pushing forward against 
the sword, sending Nemesis stumbling back a foot.  Serpentor thrusted the 
blade forward, Nemesis parrying and backhanding Serpentor.  The reptilian 
went back a foot, slashing in a rage down at Nemesis, who blocked the deadly 
blow, his arms above his head as he held Serpentor's blade at bay.

---

"I...don't...think...so...psycho!" he yelled, surging forward violently, 
Nemesis pushing Serpentor's blade up, ending the crackling sound, 
simultaneously slamming into Serpentor as hard as he could, sending the clone 
of the original Serpentor slamming to the ground three feet away.  

---

"What wrong, don't have the internal circuitry to take me on, boyo?" 
Serpentor asked mockingly, getting to his feet, eyeying his energy blade, 
thought not being obvious about it.  "Let's fight the ol' fashioned way!" 
Serpentor looked at Nemesis optics now.  "Come on, champ.  Try and take on 
the champino!" he taunted, raising his fists.

---

Nemesis gave a lopsided grin, throwing his blade forward, it deactivating and 
disappearing into subspace.  "Alrighty then!" he yelled.  Charging forward, 
Serpentor ducked low, Nemesis' abdomen connecting with Serpentor's head.  
Nemesis let "boxed" the sides of Serpentor's heads.  Serpentor sent a knee to 
Nemesis Enforcer's abdomen twice, punching him with a mean hook.

---

Serpentor sent a roundhouse kick, Nemesis blocking it with both arms, though 
stumbling back from the force of the kick.  Serpentor charged forward, 
leaping into the air, sending a foot flinging up quickly, in a kind of a jump 
kick, his foot met with Nemesis chin while going up, sending the Alliance 
member's head jerking back. 
The clone landed on his feet.  Taking a step forward, he punched Nemesis in 
the abdomen, the robot keeling over, mech-fluid leaking from his lip.  
Serpentor uppercutted Nemesis in the jaw, sending him flinging to his back.
"Pahtetic!" Serpentor chuckled, slamming his right foot down on Nemesis' 
damaged abdomen as hard as he could.

Nemesis grabbed the foot, trying to twist it, but to no avail.  Serpentor 
bent down, pulling Nemesis up, twirling, throwing him, sending Nemesis 
running forward uncontrollably, slamming into a tree headfirst, slamming to 
the ground on his back from the impact.

Serpentor leaned over Nemesis, inspecting the damage he'd done.  His face 
plate was cracked and covered in mech-fluid.  Almost beyond recognization.  
Probably from the collision with the tree.  Both optics had been shattered, 
mech-fluid leaking into them and down the side of his face, the blue liquid 
staining the green grass around Nemesis.  The rest of the damage had been 
internal.  Serpentor smiled as he saw Nemesis try to get up.  "Love ta kill 
you lad, but it wouldn't be any fun!" he said, slapping Nemesis mockingly.

"Y...y...y...you'll...pay...y...I'M GONNA KILL YOU!" Nemesis yelled in a 
rage, grabbing Serpentor by the neck, twisting it hard, a snapping noise as 
some of the servos in the neck broke apart.  Serpentor pulled back quickly, 
unintentionally helping Enforcer up.  Nemesis smiled, punching Serpentor in 
the face, followed by two more punches, followed up by an elbow to the neck.  
Serpentor leaned against a tree for support, trying to breath.  Robots didn't 
need to breath.  But if they didn't breath at all, the parts of their body 
that needed oxygen wouldn't work, hence he would die.  Of course there's 
nothing to worry about, it hurt like Hell!

Nemesis wlaked over to Scattershot, who had a tight grip on DeathStorm's 
battered and detached head.  "Hmmm..." Nemesis mused, picking up the head, 
feeling a force hit him in the back, he went forward, his shoulder slamming 
into a tree, a cracking sound heard as parts in the shoulder snapped like 
twigs.

Serpentor charged forward, ready to slam his entire body against Nemesis.  
His head bent down, he looked up for a moment, not wanting to run into a tree 
on accident instead of his target.  He yelled, trying to stop, barely 
stopping before Nemesis, seeing DeathStorm's mouth moving.
"Wh.."

"Hi, Serpentor, I'm DeathStorm!  I live!  HELP ME AND I AM YOURS TO COMMAND!" 

Serpentor saw the lips moving, and Nemesis Enforcer had slumped to the 
ground, and it WASN'T Nemesis' voice.

"You're still alive?"

"Y..yeah, barely.  The piles of slag tried to kill me!  THEN THAT FREAK CUT 
OFF MY SLAGGING HEAD!  You've gotta help me!"

"Ugh.." Serpentor was getting confused.  Walking over to the head, a fist hit 
him in the abdomen, Nemesis getting up.  "You're an idiot!" he yelled, 
kneeing Serpentor in the chin.

Serpentor spat up some mech-fluid, a kick to Nemesis' sternum sending the 
Alliance member, who still had a hold of DeathStorm's head, hitting a tree.  
Serpentor punched, again and again, a steady river of mech-fluid leaking from 
Nemesis' mouth and "nose", beginning to cough it up in bubbles.

Serpentor elbowed Nemesis in the face, the put his hands together, swinging 
the club made of his hands, beating it against Nemesis face, mech fluid 
slapshing to the green grass.  Serpentor laughed.  "Now, you die!" he yelled, 
taking out an energon dagger and raising it, but he saw Nemesis turn quickly, 
DeathStorm's head slamming against his face, sending him stumbling back, 
dropping the dagger.  Again and again DeathStorm's head met Serpentor's own 
face, beginning to heavily dent.
  
"DeathStorm REALLY doesn't like you, Serpentor!" Nemesis chuckled, or at 
least it sounded somewhat like a chuckle, muffled with the mess of 
mech-fluid.  Serpentor was down on his knees, the beating to much.  "Hi, 
Serpentor!  Watch for me in the Pit!" Nemesis said in DeathStorm's voice, 
moving DeathStom's mouth, slamming the head down against Serpentor's 
forehead, laughing manically, beating the head down again and again and again 
against his head.  After eight slams, the tossed the head, it hitting 
Scattershot.  Nemesis began to walk, seeing Hades and Anubis running towards 
him.  Taking out his energy blade, he stumbled forward, two plasma bolts from 
Anubis' plasma rifle sending him slamming to the ground, going unconciouss, 
the colors swirling into a mess, soon he saw DeathStorm's face (this is all 
"in his head") laughing manically.  In DeathStorm's own voice the head 
laughed.

"Oh, Nemesis.  Nemesis!  You know what you have to do!  Avenge me!  Kill 
those who killed me!"

"But...I killed you, or helped." Nemesis reminded the head.

"Oooh!  I should ask Scattershot, shouldn't I?  He's crazier than you, isn't 
he?"

"Yeah."

"Oh, thanks Nemesis."

"No problem pal!"

DeathStorm's head flashed a bright green, and the head disappeared, leaving 
nothing but blackness.  (Nemesis Enforcer IS NOT dead)

---

Anubis walked over to Serpentor, Hades able to walk now.  "Holy slag!  You 
guys beat the living scrap out of each other!" A hand grabbed Anubis, pulling 
him closer to Serpentor's mech-fluid soaked face.

"Hey, Anububi, wanna know something?"

"What?"

"I NOTICED WE BEAT EACH OTHER UP WHEN I HEARD MY NECK SNAP AND SAW HIS SOAKED 
FACE!  NOW...get me the hell out of here." he said, passing out.
Anubis put Serpentor over his shoulder, heading back for base.

---
Hell Beast and Zardus' heads appeared (all in Serpentor's 'mind').  

"Serpentor!  You must avenge those who killed you!" Zardus yelled.

Serpentor looked around confused.  "B...but it was your guys and you who 
killed me."

"Oh, that's right!" Zardus chuckled.  "You know, I forget who I kill!  The 
Alliance just sits back and kills so many people it's hard to keep track!"

Hell Beast's head swerved to Zardus.  "Posh posh!  My group kills more!"

"Mine!" Zardus countered.

"Mine!"

"Mine!"

"Mine!"

A red arm appeared out of no where, slapping Zardus across the face.  "Mine!"

Zardus' entire body appeared, kicking Hell Beast's head and arm, sending him 
through the air like a soccer ball.  "MINE YOU BAG OF RUST!  See, we win!"

Serpentor could see himself now, taking out a rifle, firing a single bolt, 
hittin Zardus in his chest plate.  Nothing happened for a moment, suddenly 
Zardus exploded, his head the only part that didn't go up.

Fidget's head appeared.  "Serpentor!  Avenge me!  Kill the one that killed 
me!"

Serpentor looked to Fidget.  "I KILL YOU YOU DOLT!"

"Oh, I should ask that Scattershot guy then, shouldn't I?"

"Evidently!"

"He's crazier than you, isn't he?"

"What?!"

"Now, don't be upset, everyone has someone better than them in the universe."

"I'M NOT CRAZY!" Serpentor yelled, reaching into subspace, taking out a 
baseball bat made of wood, beating on Fidget's head unti it broke apart.  A 
mini DeathStorm came out from the head, doing the river dance.

Then there was darknesss in Serpentor's mind.  (Serpentor isn't dead)
